Welcome

XPaXS is a collection of python packages and libraries for X-ray Science. XPaXS was developed with the hope that it many will find it useful, and many will contribute to --- and take credit for --- its development. XPaXS is open source software, all of its dependencies are compatible with the GNU Public License.

This project began with the goal of providing useful real-time feedback and analysis of scanning X-ray fluorescence microscopy experiments, using several existing and very successful libraries such as PyMca, SpecClient, Matplotlib, PyQt4, NumPy, h5py, and ParallelPython. It quickly became clear, however, that with a little abstraction XPaXS was poised to provide a framework for X-ray science in general.
